name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary: As a driven Senior ML Engineer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in **Python** and have a robust foundation in **Machine Learning**, **Statistics**, **Data Engineering**, and algorithms. I excel in collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-performance solutions, integrating predictive analytics and real-time data processing capabilities. My technical expertise also includes developing machine learning pipelines and deploying ML models in production while implementing MLOps workflows using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. I have a solid background in optimization and data structures to refine algorithms, ensuring robust and efficient application performance. My extensive knowledge in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Flutter**, and full-stack frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** complements my machine learning skills, allowing me to build comprehensive solutions. Additionally, I bring expertise in cloud environments with **Azure** and **AWS**, and ensure compliance with industry standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.

Executed comprehensive testing strategies, utilizing tools like **Jest**, **Cypress**, **PyTest**, and **Postman** to cover unit testing, integration, and end-to-end testing across all services, ensuring high code quality and reliability.

Conducted statistical analyses to refine model performance, ensuring robust and reliable outcomes in data-driven decision-making processes.
